lyrics:
13 contributorswe’ve got everything lyricschorus 1 isaac brock
weve got everything

down to a science so

we know everything we know we know
we know everything we know

i guess weve done everything

if we carried it out to sea
pushed it over the edge wed have all been through
well first off gary got drunk
fell asleep in his car til about noon
awe flat top tony got all messed up
split his lip chasing cheap perfume
well look at our boat in the bay
it looks like some sadass little canoe

weve done everything weve done weve done weve done
weve done everything

i guess well stop tryin now
and never try it again
see modest mouse liveget tickets as low as 76you might also likechorus 4 isaac brock james mercer both

how we got everything how we got it all

if we carried it out to sea
pushed it over the edge
we could have all been through
well no one even bothered showing up
but we still did what we should have thought through

bridge isaac brock isaac brock james mercer
we crashed in like waves into the store
didnt want it didnt need it
but we knew that we could see it
so we opened up the door
we receded like waves out of the store
didnt want it didnt need it
but we knew that we could steal it
left you dying on the floor
we werent that lucky
weve got weve got weve got weve got weve got
weve got weve got weve got weve got weve got
weve got well everyone had one oh gah dah kuh huh
chorus 5 isaac brock isaac brock isaac brock james mercer both
weve got everything weve got weve got weve got
weve got everything
weve got everything down to a science so
i guess we know everything

outro isaac brock isaac brock isaac brock james mercer both
weve got everything weve got everything
weve done everything weve got everything
weve tried everything weve got everything weve got—
weve got everything weve got everything weve got weve got weve got weve got—
oh weve got every thing1embed
